38.description: hereby apply, under the Placer Mining Act for a grant of a claim for Placer Mining

41.description: And I make Oath and Say that:

42.description: 1. To the best of my knowledge and belief, the land is such as can be located under Section 17 of the said Act.

44.description: I did on the  day of  20

45.description: mark out on the ground, in accordance on every particular with the provisions of the said Act, the claim for

46.description: which I make this application and in so doing I did not encroach on any other claim or mining location

47.description: previously laid out by any other person.

48.description: 3. The length of the said claim, as nearly as I could measure is  feet

50.description: I staked out the claim by planting two legal posts numbered 1 and 2 respectively.

51.description: I make this application in good faith to acquire the claim for the sole purpose of mining to be prosecuted by

52.description: myself or by myself and associates or by my assigns.

53.description: Sworn before me at  this  day of  20

54.description: about the collection and use of this information can be directed to the Mining Recorders Office, Mineral Resources, Department of Energy, Mines and

56.description: Access to Information and Protection of Privacy Act

57.description: The personal information requested on this form is collected under the authority of and used for the purpose of administering the Placer Mining Act. Questions

60.description: Resources, Yukon Government, Box 2703, Whitehorse, Yukon Territory, Y1A 2C6 (867) 667-3190.
